entry.title: Commitment anxiety
entry.body: I keep hesitating to finish a small project because I worry it will prove I'm not as good as I think.

outputs.editor:
SUMMARY:
I keep delaying a small project because I worry completing it will reveal I am less capable than I believe.
FIXES:
- "keep hesitating": specify how this shows up (delay starts, avoid deadlines) to reduce vagueness.
- "finish a small project": name the scope to make the commitment concrete.
- "prove I'm not as good": clarify the standard of "good" used here.
REWRITE:
I keep delaying a small project because I worry completing it will reveal I am less capable than I believe.
